title: Which college do you believe has the coolest mascot? - Quora

response.answer_text: As an enormous supporter of the University of Michigan Wolverines, I’m going to give you a funny answer: none. Mascots are, at best, silly and frivolous. For example, Brutus the Buckeye is just awful:  At worst, they can be offensive, like Notre Dame’s fighting red-headed leprechaun:  Or the Florida State Seminoles’ Osceola and Renegade:  Michigan is one of the only big-time sports colleges without a mascot, and while every once in a while an alumnus brings it up, they are quickly shouted down by the rest of us. (That said, we DID have a live Wolverine for a while back in the 1920s - which, of course, was a TERRIBLE idea.) So, to summarize: college mascots are stupid and sometimes offensive, and they add nothing to any game except a distraction for when the team is bad. And it’s my opinion that everyone should get rid of them.
The Rhode Island School of Design has Scrotie as their mascot. He is a scrotum.
